title: Club Management
body: So, I just noticed this, but I can't see my club and my club name, at first I thought that it was a bug, but my brother checked for me and it says i'm still in the club. (He is in the club) and the owner of it. I don't know what is happening but I need help to fix it.

replies.body: A recent club outage caused some issues, like owners being unable to see their club.  What's your club name and tag?  Let me know or submit it in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll get that refreshed.  We'll get your club issue fixed up!

Club Name: Darker Than Light

Club Tag: Jikan

Thank you for helping me fix this problem.

Hello! Same problem as the one you mentioned. Would be greatly appreciated if you could refresh my club for me!

Club Name: INVALIDS

Club Tag: lame$

IGN: queenbiitchacho

If you need to kick me and promote another member, please promote pandaz93. Thank you in advance!!
